ai-patthana24.3:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana24.3:2.1_0: Dissatisfaction of the three basis, three, four, five, and three.
ai-patthana24.3:3.1_0: For the sake of seeing the causes and conditions for the sake of seeing the causes and conditions to arise.
ai-patthana24.3:4.1_0: For the cause of a reason for not giving up a bad principle, the support of the teaching, the support of the teaching.
ai-patthana24.3:5.1_0: Not for the sake of seeing the cause or condition for the sake of health.
ai-patthana24.3:6.1_0: You don’t cause any condition for the sake of health.
ai-patthana24.3:6.1_1: (This is the same as the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana24.3:7.1_0: Not knowing and seeing the cause or condition for form ...
ai-patthana24.3:8.1_0: Not knowing and seeing the cause or condition for form.
ai-patthana24.3:9.1_0: None for the sake of worldly gain is not a cause.
ai-patthana24.3:9.1_1: Not cause or condition for the sake of worldly gain, not for the sake of purification.
ai-patthana24.3:9.1_2: said to be a group of three.
ai-patthana24.3:9.1_3: This is the cause, the reason why the three kinds of determined. ...
ai-patthana24.3:10.1_0: for the sake of worldly conditions,
ai-patthana24.3:11.1_0: Nor makes any effort for the sake of purification by for someone else.
ai-patthana24.3:12.1_0: No cause for the sake of this Teaching by others, nor for any other reason.
